post.content:
## MXC 2020 Giveaway is Live!
**To go into New Year in style, we are launching a MASSIVE bounty, filled with prizes such as Airdrops, Apple Airpods, and iPhone 11 Pro!**

To get started, you will need a **Twitter account** and a **Telegram account**. So make sure you have those, and let’s get started!

Step 1: [Fill out this form](https://kirill951784.typeform.com/to/neS2Oj)

Step 2: Follow us on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mxcfoundation)

Step 3: Join us on [Telegram](https://t.me/mxcfoundation), and say hi!

After completing those three steps, you get **3 tickets**.

## Ticket System Explained
Until January 1, 2020 at 10PM (CET), you will have chances to earn **tickets** every day. Tickets are the vouchers you can trade in to claim various gifts and giveaways. There are many activities every day through which you can earn tickets, such as:

**Telegram Quiz**: **Twice per day**, there will be quizzes on our Telegram group. By giving the correct answer, you can get **1 ticket** per correct answer. Each quiz stays valid until the next quiz.
Telegram Quiz will be held at: **11AM CET** and **10PM CET**, every day.

**Twitter Quiz**: **Twice per day**, there will be quizzes on our Twitter. By clicking ''**Like**'' on the Tweet and **commenting** the correct answer, you can get **1 ticket** per correct answer. Each quiz stays valid until the next quiz.
Twitter Quiz will be held at: **1PM CET** and **6PM CET**, every day.

**Trade-in Reps for Tickets**: Per **100 Reps** earned, you are automatically granted **1 ticket**. To ensure fairness to new community members, **only Reps earned from December 9 to January 1 will count**.
Reps, or “Reputation Points”, are given to those who are excellent to each other. This may be being helpful, answering questions, or reporting spam and suspicious behavior.
To give reputation points, simply reply to the recipient’s comment with “/rep” to give 1 reputation point. You may comment with “/rep 2” to give 2 reputation points. You can give up to 10 reputation points per day.
[More details can be found here.](https://blog.mxc.org/reputation-system/)

**Stake MXC tokens to earn Tickets**: Staking your MXC tokens to Supernodes are the safest way to earn an interest rate on your tokens. **Per 2000 MXC tokens staked**, you automatically receive **1 ticket**.
More information about how to stake MXC tokens can be found here.

## Claiming Prizes
We have prepared various prizes for each category! The categories are as following:

**100 Tickets: MXC Pen**

**200 Tickets: USB Card**

**300 Tickets: MXC t-shirt**

**400 Tickets: MXC Mug**

**500 Tickets: MXC Metal Coin (random airdrop from $1 to $1000)**

**600 Tickets: MXC Hoodie**

**700 Tickets: Amazon Giftcard**

**800 Tickets: Powerbank**

**900 Tickets: Smart Watch**

**1000 Tickets: Football Jersey (Team of your choice)**

**1200 Tickets: Amazon Echo Dot**

**1300 Tickets: Apple Airpods**

**1400 Tickets: iPhone 11 Pro**

You have until January 1, 10PM CET to earn as many tickets as possible!


## Random Event
If you do not acquire enough tickets at the end, you can still participate in various “Random Events” to win **CASH PRIZES**. Random Events are announced on Twitter at random times, and some may last for only an hour, while some may last for a few days.
So make sure to follow us on Twitter!

## Good luck to everyone!

*MXC Foundation gGmbH holds all the rights to disqualify participants in cases where fraudulent activity is suspected. Fraudulent behaviour includes, but is not limited to: Interacting with multiple accounts to gain unjust advantages, forging of any kind, and inter-voting rep points. Due to the limited supply of the prizes, prizes will be given on a first-completed, first-received points basis. Those who reach the number of required tickets first will have the chance to claim the prizes. In order to be in the running to receive a prize, participants must complete all required tasks, provide his/her email address, phone number, and shipping address. This information shall only be used for shipping purposes. If the participant fails to respond with the information within 3 days, the prize will be assigned to another person on the list. By receiving the prizes, participants agree to be featured on all promotions in regards to the giveaway. For any reason if a prize is unavailable the prize may be replaced for another prize at the same or lesser value.Winners will be announced by Midday (CET – Berlin, Central European Time) by January 10, 2020. If the participant has revoked or removed any of the activities he/she has performed in order to be eligible for a prize by the time of the announcement, the prize may be cancelled and be given to another participant on the winners list. The prize pool is limited, by achieving the specified amount of points / tickets required to be eligible to win a prize does not automatically ensure you will receive a prize. MXC Foundation gGmbH is the operator of this competition and any disputes will be held in the courts of Berlin, Germany. No prizes may be traded for cash or the cash value of the prize, the prizes are accepted “as is”. Due to the fact that MXC gGmbH is the sole proprietor of this competition all decisions made by MXC gGmbH are final. MXC gGmbH can end this competition at any time and has the right to refuse any entries for any reason.*
post.metaDescription: Go into 2020 in style. Participate in MXC 2020 Giveaway to win Amazon Gift Cards, Apple Airpod, iPhone 11 Pro, and more! Giveaway ends soon!

post.content:
## MXC极域2020大奖活动开始啦！

**为了迎接新年的到来，我们将推出大量的赏金，其中包括空投，Apple Airpods和iPhone 11 Pro等奖品！**

首先，您需要一个**推特（Twitter）帐户**和一个**电报群（Telegram）账户**。 因此，请先确保您拥有这些账号，然后开始吧！

**步骤1：**[填写此表格](https://kirill951784.typeform.com/to/neS2Oj)

**步骤2：**在[推特](https://www.twitter.com/mxcfoundation)上关注我们

**步骤3：**加入我们的[电报群](https://t.me/mxcfoundation)，然后打个招呼！

完成这三个步骤后，您将获得**3张奖券**。
## 奖券系统说明

2020年1月1日晚上10点（CET）截止，您将有机会每天赚取**奖券**。 奖券是您可以用来兑换各种礼物和赠品的代金券。 每天都有许多活动可以赚取奖券，例如：

**电报群小测验**：我们的电报群每天将有两次小测验。 给出正确答案后，每个正确答案可获得**1张奖券**。 每个小测验在下一个测验之前一直有效。电报群小测验每天将在**欧洲中部时间上午11点和欧洲中部时间晚上10点举行**。

**推特小测验**：我们的推特上每天将会有两次小测验。 通过在推特上单“赞”并评论回答正确，每个正确答案可获得1张奖券。 每个小测验在下一个测验之前都有效。
推特小测验每天将在欧洲中部时间下午1点和欧洲中部时间下午6点举行。

**奖券的交易Reps**：每赚取**100 Reps**，您将自动获得**1张奖券**。 为了确保新社区成员的公平，**只有从12月9日到1月1日之间获得的Reps才算在内。**
Reps，或称“声望值”，给予对大家来说表现优秀的人。 这可能会是帮助其他成员、回答问题或报告垃圾邮件和可疑行为。
要给出声望值，只需在回复收件人的评论时简单添加“ / rep”即可发放1个声望值。 您可以留言“ / rep 2”进行注释，以发放2个声望值。 您每天最多可以发放10个声望值。
[可以在这里找到更多信息。](https://blog.mxc.org/zh-hans/%e4%bb%8b%e7%bb%8d%e5%a3%b0%e8%aa%89%e7%b3%bb%e7%bb%9f/)

**质押MXC极域通证以赚取奖券**：将MXC极域通证质押入超级节点是获得通证增长最安全方法。 **每质押2000个MXC极域通证**，您将自动获得**1张奖券**。
有关如何质押MXC极域通证的更多信息，请参见此处。

## 领奖

**100张奖券：MXC极域专属纪念笔**

**200张奖券：USB卡**

**300张奖券：MXC极域专属T恤**

**400张奖券：MXC极域专属马克杯**

**500张奖券：MXC极域纪念金币（从1美元到1000美元的随机空投）**

**600奖券：MXC极域连帽卫衣**

**700张奖券：亚马逊礼品卡**

**800张奖券：充电宝**

**900张奖券：智能手表**

**1000张奖券：足球球衣（您选择的球队）**

**1200张奖券：亚马逊Echo Dot**

**1300张奖券：Apple Airpods**

**1400张奖券：iPhone 11 Pro**

您必须在欧洲中部时间1月1日晚上10点之前赢得尽可能多的奖券！

## 随机活动

如果您最后没有获得足够的门票，您仍然可以参加各种“随机活动”以赢得**现金奖**。 随机事件是在推特上随机宣布的，有些事件可能仅持续一个小时，而有些事件可能持续几天。
因此，请确保在推特上关注我们！

**祝大家好运！**

*如果怀疑有欺诈行为，MXC极域基金会保留取消参赛者资格的所有权利。 欺诈行为包括但不限于：与多个帐户进行互动以获得不正当的优势，伪造任何形式，并且对声望值进行内部投票。 由于奖品的供应有限，奖品将按照先完成，先接收的积分来分配。 那些先达到所需奖券数量的人将有机会领取奖品。 为了参加比赛，参加者必须完成所有必需的任务，并提供他/她的电子邮件地址，电话号码和送货地址。 此信息应仅用于快递运输。 如果参与者未能在3天内回答信息，则奖金将分配给列表中的其他人。 通过获得奖品，参与者同意参加有关赠品的所有促销活动。 出于任何原因，如果无法获得奖品，则可以将奖品替换为价值相同或更低的其他奖品。获奖者名单将在2020年1月10日中午（欧洲中部时间–柏林）宣布。 如果参与者在宣布之时已经撤回或移除了他/她为获得奖品而进行的任何活动，则该奖品可能会被取消并分配给获奖者名单上的其他参与者。 由于奖品的数量是有限的，所以达到获得奖品所需的指定积分/券数并不能自动确保您将获得相应的奖品。 MXC极域基金会是该活动的运营商，任何争议将在德国柏林的法院进行。 所有奖品不能兑换成现金或其现金价值的奖品，这些奖品将“按原样”接受。 由于MXC极域基金会是本次活动的唯一运营商，因此MXC极域基金会的所有决定均为最终决定。 MXC极域基金会可以随时终止比赛，并有权以任何理由拒绝任何参赛。*
post.metaDescription: 进入2020年。 参加MXC极域 2020 大奖活动，既有机会赢取亚马逊（Amazon）礼品卡，Apple Airpod，iPhone 11 Pro等更多奖品等您来拿！ 奖品活动即将结束！

**400张奖券：MXC极域专属马克杯**

**500张奖券：MXC极域纪念金币（从1美元到1000美元的随机空投）**

**600奖券：MXC极域连帽卫衣**

**700张奖券：亚马逊礼品卡**

**800张奖券：充电宝**

**900张奖券：智能手表**

**1000张奖券：足球球衣（您选择的球队）**

**1200张奖券：亚马逊Echo Dot**

**1300张奖券：Apple Airpods**

**1400张奖券：iPhone 11 Pro**

您必须在欧洲中部时间1月1日晚上10点之前赢得尽可能多的奖券！

## 随机活动
